channel.title: Man Like Politics
channel.itunes:subtitle: The podcast about Politics
channel.itunes:author: Furnisha Lycett, Pouneh Ahari, Marley McIntosh
channel.itunes:summary: The Man Like Politics podcast brings political discussions to the everyday listener. Covering everything from the political influence of pop-culture to discussions on nuclear weapons, if it's got a political influence, we're here for it! Produced and hosted by Pouneh Ahari, Camarley McIntosh and Furnisha Lycett, this podcast is here to bring fresh discussions to the UK political scene.

item.itunes:title: Nuclear Weapons
item.title: Nuclear Weapons
item.itunes:author: Furnisha Lycett, Pouneh Ahari, Marley McIntosh
item.itunes:subtitle: Nuclear Weapons
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we discuss the controversial topic of nuclear weapons and their relevance in today's society.
item.description: In this episode we discuss the controversial topic of nuclear weapons and their relevance in today's society.
